mainDescription: Traveling is an incredible journey that allows me to throw myself into diverse cultures and embrace the essence of each unique destination. It provides me an opportunity for personal growth and opening a world of new experience. With every adventure, I appreciate the chance to understand what it truly means to live in different places and cherish the value of diverse cultures.

montreal.title: Montreal 2022
montreal.description: I set out on a remarkable solo journey to Montreal, and the experience turned out to be amazing. It not only introduced me to new places and cultures but also offered me an opportunity for self-reflection and personal development. Navigating the city alone allowed me to explore into my inner thoughts, leading to a better understanding of myself. The memories I created during this adventure still resonate with me to this day.

newYork.title: New York September 2023 Plan
newYork.description: After my solo trip to Montreal, I came to realized that I enjoy solo traveling and eager for more adventures. So, this year, I planned my next trip to New York. Fascinated by my friends' captivating tales of food, parks, people, and the overall sense of exploration, I firmly believe this upcoming journey will be another unforgettable experience.

thingsToDo.title: Activities that I plan to do there
list: Go to at least one boxing gym
Try to meet as many people as I can, plus I am staying in a hostel
